data.text: @dthroat @UKCovid19Stats There are also people that can’t quite accept the end of the covid farce is actually here. Now we get to start paying for it...
@markbray25 @UKCovid19Stats And yet here you are as usual.

@dthroat @UKCovid19Stats Ignoring !? We’ve focused on a mild illness with all the voracity of a common flu for a very long time, all while our economy tanks and this shitshow government spend money from that great cash machine in the sky. There are still people that want to spend 2b a week on tests...
@FreddieScovell @UKCovid19Stats The sheep will be stopping in a couple of weeks when they're chargeable 😀

@winstane72 @FreddieScovell @UKCovid19Stats It does, that’s why we have the flu jab. 

There have been minimal cases that needed hospitalisation in the past two years because of the isolation/lockdowns.
@Matronmamma @FreddieScovell @UKCovid19Stats Well we don't test non-hospitalised people for flu and that doesn't exist any more
@winstane72 @FreddieScovell @UKCovid19Stats Why do people think that stopping testing will end Covid?
@michaelstaine16 @UKCovid19Stats The world is full of problems.  Doesn't help ignoring them though.
